blocks.content:
## What We Do

We work with Shopify store owners to help them recover their abandoned carts. We offer a couple of different packages ranging from a DIY option for small stores through to a more bespoke service if you're really busy and just want us to set up an automated recovery sequence for you.

## Why you should care

The simple fact of the matter is, it's actually really straightforward to set up a cart abandonment email marketing sequence. Many stores are losing over 70% of their customers after they add products to their shopping cart so even recovering just a small percentage of them can really add up.

hero.headline: Cart Recover
hero.textline: Abandoned cart recovery for Shopify stores
